root: ^player: I just ran into more of those things… what are they
^friend: I don't know, they look like zombies but who knows
^friend: jesus, there's more of them coming, the darkness it's the eating zombies
^friend: I'm not sure, whatever you do don't let the darkness reach you, keep moving
^friend: It looks like I've reached a deadend… it looks like there are two paths but they're both blocked by something
^friend: I found a note that says you can open one of the paths for me
^friend: not exactly, but it does say you have a choice…
^friend: make sure you open the red door
^player: red door? Okay got it, I'll take a look around and see what I can find
^You find two button and have to choose which one to switch
^You suspect there may be more enemies through one of these routes...
